Body:
"""
    Check the jog function.
    """
with expected_protocol(ik.newport.AGUC2, ['MR', '1 JA 3', '2 JA -4'], [],
    sep='\r\n') as agl:
    agl.axis['X'].jog = 3
    agl.axis['Y'].jog = -4
    with pytest.raises(ValueError):
        agl.axis['X'].jog = -5
    with pytest.raises(ValueError):
        agl.axis['Y'].jog = 5
